data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Bonaire, Bonaire, Sint Eustatius and Saba today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bonaire, Bonaire, Sint Eustatius and Saba
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Bonaire, Bonaire, Sint Eustatius and Saba.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 babies will be born in the next month to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Bonaire, Bonaire, Sint Eustatius and Saba.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, encourage every believer in Bonaire, Bonaire, Sint Eustatius and Saba to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Bonaire, Bonaire, Sint Eustatius and Saba.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Dorp Rincón
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Dorp Rincón, Bonaire, Bonaire, Sint Eustatius and Saba.
Father, help your children in Bonaire, Bonaire, Sint Eustatius and Saba find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 2,142 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.

data.focus_label: Bonaire, Bonaire, Sint Eustatius and Saba
data.section_summary:
the state of Bonaire, Bonaire, Sint Eustatius and Saba has a population of 3,100.

We estimate Bonaire has 87 people who might know Jesus, 2,142 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 871 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 35 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help the 87 believers in Bonaire to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 3,013 lost friends and neighbors.
